Description: This corpus contains various subcorpora that compile texts from a great number of domains, such as literary texts, political documents, subtitles, UN documents, and the debates of the European Parliament.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from a dedicated webpage and through a dedicated concordancer.
This corpus is a part of the Bulgarian National Corpus.#SEPThe corpus is available through a dedicated concordancer.
This corpus contains texts from EU law books and related publications.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the OPUS webpage.

This corpus contains texts from the CORDIC and RAPID websites, and the press releases of the European Parliament and the European Southern Observatory.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from META-SHARE.

This corpus contains TED talks in English and translations into the following languages: Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Dutch, French, German, Hebrew, Italian, Japanese, Korean, and Russian.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from GIT-HUB.
This corpus contains texts from the setimes.com website.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from a dedicated webpage.

This corpus contains the official records and other parliamentary documents of the United Nations that are in the public domain in the following languages: English, Russian, Spanish, French, Chinese, and Arabic.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from a dedicated webpage.

This corpus contains tweets and blogposts in the following language pairs: English-Mandarin, English-Arabic, English-Russian, English-Korean, and English-Japanese.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from a dedicated webpage.

This corpus contains texts related to computer and IT troubleshooting for the following language pairs: Bulgarian-English, Czech-English, Portuguese-English, Spanish-English, and Basque-English#SEPThe corpus available for download from META-SHARE under the CC-BY license.
This corpus contains Wikipedia texts in the following language pairs: English-German, English-Romanian, and English-Spanish.
Note: For access, contact the resource managers.

Description: This corpus contains news articles in the following language pairs: English-Czech, English-German and English-Spanish.
Note: For access, contact the resource managers.

Description: This corpus contains scientific articles from the Scielo database in the following language pairs: English-French, English-Spanish, and English-Portuguese.
Note: For access, contact the resource managers.

Description: This corpus contains texts from the United Nations website from 2000 to 2009 in the following language pairs: Spanish-Chinese, Chinese-Spanish, French-Chinese, and Chinese-French.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from a dedicated webpage.
This is a multilingual corpus of English, French and Greek.
Note: For access, contact the resource managers.
